channel.title: pipeline on CDS Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in pipeline on CDS Documentation

item.title: create
item.description: cdsctl pipeline create Create a CDS pipeline Synopsis Create a CDS pipeline cdsctl pipeline create PROJECT-KEY PIPELINE-NAME [flags] Options -h, --help help for create --type string Pipeline type {build,deployment,testing} (default "build") (default "build") Options inherited from parent commands -f, --file string set configuration file -k, --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -w, --no-warnings do not display warnings -v, --verbose verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl pipeline - Manage CDS pipeline

item.title: delete
item.description: cdsctl pipeline delete Delete a CDS pipeline Synopsis Delete a CDS pipeline cdsctl pipeline delete PROJECT-KEY PIPELINE-NAME [flags] Options --force Force delete without confirmation and exit 0 if resource does not exist -h, --help help for delete Options inherited from parent commands -f, --file string set configuration file -k, --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -w, --no-warnings do not display warnings -v, --verbose verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl pipeline - Manage CDS pipeline

item.title: export
item.description: cdsctl pipeline export Export CDS pipeline Synopsis Export CDS pipeline cdsctl pipeline export PROJECT-KEY PIPELINE-NAME [flags] Options --format string yml or json (default "yml") -h, --help help for export --with-permission true or false Options inherited from parent commands -f, --file string set configuration file -k, --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -w, --no-warnings do not display warnings -v, --verbose verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl pipeline - Manage CDS pipeline

item.title: import
item.description: cdsctl pipeline import Import CDS pipeline Synopsis PATH: Path or URL of pipeline to import cdsctl pipeline import PROJECT-KEY PATH [flags] Options --force Use force flag to update your pipeline -h, --help help for import Options inherited from parent commands -f, --file string set configuration file -k, --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -w, --no-warnings do not display warnings -v, --verbose verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl pipeline - Manage CDS pipeline

item.title: list
item.description: cdsctl pipeline list List CDS pipelines Synopsis List CDS pipelines cdsctl pipeline list PROJECT-KEY [flags] Options --fields string Only display specified object fields. 'empty' will display all fields, 'all' will display all object fields, 'field1,field2' to select multiple fields --filter string Filter output based on conditions provided --format string Output format: table|json|yaml (default "table") -h, --help help for list -q, --quiet Only display object's key Options inherited from parent commands -f, --file string set configuration file -k, --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers.
